name: DEMO - Super Realistic Rally Racing
description:
Handle your rally car and get the best time while managing an unpredictable carton of eggs.  One eye stays on the road while the other try's to catch manage the eggs! This demo includes the challenging New England Map with large straightaways and a challenging hill descent section and includes the AWD Quattro. Post High Scores, bugs, and suggestions in the Comments!

More Maps, More Cars, and Modifiers will be available in the full version which will be released during the summer.

Controller Required!

working on bugs. Patch soon
